registered_study.title: Demo preregistration with intentional ID mismatches

analysis_plan.notes: This prereg file is intentionally inconsistent with extraction CSV and taxonomy JSONL for demo validation.

reasons: primary study_id does not match extraction/taxonomy references
planned_extraction_id uses underscore and should fail regex
duplicate outcome IDs to trigger uniqueness checks
includes an unknown taxonomy node id TAX:9999
expected_checker_findings: Cross-file mismatch: STUDY-9999 not found in extraction
Cross-file mismatch: TAX:9999 not found in taxonomy
